title: Enhancing lithium storage rate and durability in sphalerite GeP by engineering configurational entropy
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01329H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yanhong Li, Jeng-Han Wang, Tzu-Yu Liu, Xinwei Li, Zaiping Guo, Meilin Liu, Wenwu Li
High-entropy sphalerite-structured compounds, derived from cubic GeP, demonstrate remarkable metallic conductivity and superior lithium-storage capabilities when compared to the parent phases of monoclinic layered GeP or SiP.
